nodes.name: UpgraderTemplate

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "New Implementation address must be valid"

arguments.value: New Implementation address must be valid

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "New Implementation address must be valid"

nodes.name: execute

nodes.documentation:
@notice Upgrade the proxy to the newImplementation
@dev IMPORTANT: This function should not be overriden
nodes.name: _upgrade

nodes.documentation:
@notice Intended to prepare the system for the upgrade
@dev This function can be overriden by child changers to upgrade contracts that require some preparation before the upgrade
nodes.name: _beforeUpgrade

nodes.documentation:
@notice Intended to do the final tweaks after the upgrade, for example initialize the contract
@dev This function can be overriden by child changers to upgrade contracts that require some changes after the upgrade
nodes.name: _afterUpgrade
UpgraderTemplate

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "New Implementation address must be valid"

arguments.value: New Implementation address must be valid

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "New Implementation address must be valid"

nodes.name: execute

nodes.documentation:
@notice Upgrade the proxy to the newImplementation
@dev IMPORTANT: This function should not be overriden
nodes.name: _upgrade

nodes.documentation:
@notice Intended to prepare the system for the upgrade
@dev This function can be overriden by child changers to upgrade contracts that require some preparation before the upgrade
nodes.name: _beforeUpgrade

nodes.documentation:
@notice Intended to do the final tweaks after the upgrade, for example initialize the contract
@dev This function can be overriden by child changers to upgrade contracts that require some changes after the upgrade
nodes.name: _afterUpgrade

params._newImplementation: Address of the contract the proxy will delegate to
params._proxy: Address of the proxy to be upgraded
params._upgradeDelegator: Address of the upgradeDelegator in charge of that proxy

execute().details: Should be called by the governor, but this contract does not check that explicitly because it is not its responsability in the current architecture IMPORTANT: This function should not be overriden, you should only redefine the _beforeUpgrade and _afterUpgrade to use this template

userdoc.notice: This contract is a ChangeContract intended to be used when upgrading any contract upgradeable through the zos-lib upgradeability system. This doesn't initialize the upgraded contract, that should be done extending this one or taking it as a guide
